009package Ch16_Color_Edges;
010
011import ij.ImagePlus;
012import ij.gui.GenericDialog;
013import ij.plugin.filter.PlugInFilter;
014import ij.process.FloatProcessor;
015import ij.process.ImageProcessor;
016import imagingbook.common.edges.EdgeDetector;
017import imagingbook.common.edges.GrayscaleEdgeDetector;
018import imagingbook.common.ij.DialogUtils;
019import imagingbook.sampleimages.GeneralSampleImage;
020
021import static imagingbook.common.ij.IjUtils.noCurrentImage;
022
023/**
024 * <p>
025 * This ImageJ plugin implements a simple grayscale edge detector for all types of images. Color images are converted to
026 * grayscale before edge detection. See Sec. 16.1 of [1] for additional details.
027 * </p>
028 * <p>
029 * [1] W. Burger, M.J. Burge, <em>Digital Image Processing &ndash; An Algorithmic Introduction</em>, 3rd ed, Springer
030 * (2022).
031 * </p>
032 *
033 * @author WB
034 * @version 2022/12/12
035 * @see GrayscaleEdgeDetector
036 */
037public class Color_Edges_Gray implements PlugInFilter {
038
039        private static boolean ShowEdgeMagnitude = true;
040        private static boolean ShowEdgeOrientation = false;
041
042        private ImagePlus im = null;
043
044        /**
045         * Constructor, asks to open a predefined sample image if no other image is currently open.
046         */
047        public Color_Edges_Gray() {
048                if (noCurrentImage()) {
049                        DialogUtils.askForSampleImage(GeneralSampleImage.Balloons600);
050                }
051        }
052
053        @Override
054    public int setup(String arg, ImagePlus im) {
055        this.im = im;
056        return DOES_ALL + NO_CHANGES;
057    }
058
059        @Override
060    public void run(ImageProcessor ip) {
061                if (!runDialog())
062                        return;
063
064        EdgeDetector ced = new GrayscaleEdgeDetector(ip);
065                
066        if (ShowEdgeMagnitude) {
067                FloatProcessor edgeMagnitude = ced.getEdgeMagnitude();
068                (new ImagePlus("Edge Magnitude (Gray)", edgeMagnitude)).show();
069        }
070                
071                if (ShowEdgeOrientation) {
072                        FloatProcessor edgeOrientation = ced.getEdgeOrientation();
073                        (new ImagePlus("Edge Orientation (Gray)", edgeOrientation)).show();
074                }
075    }
076    
077    boolean runDialog() {
078                GenericDialog gd = new GenericDialog(this.getClass().getSimpleName());
079                gd.addCheckbox("Show edge magnitude", ShowEdgeMagnitude);
080                gd.addCheckbox("Show edge orientation", ShowEdgeOrientation);
081                
082                gd.showDialog();
083                if (gd.wasCanceled())
084                        return false;
085                
086                ShowEdgeMagnitude = gd.getNextBoolean();
087                ShowEdgeOrientation = gd.getNextBoolean();
088                return true;
089    }
090      
091}
092
